name: SpiderWay
description:
Have you ever heard laughter of a spider?
In Spider Way, spiders laugh when they reaches their respected parties. You should lead them by drawing crossing web threads on their way. None the less, 4 power-ups will help you reach this goal and 5 mini games will challenge you during the adventure.
But there is always a catch. Bad Spiders will try to stop you by blocking web threads you drew. You should act quickly and smash them before they can ruin the parties.
The game challenges your strategic skills and ability at the same time. You should consider future puzzles and think again to build a good path for spiders.

The highlights of the game are unique game play system, stylish graphics and cute sound effects. Hope you enjoy the game.

Features
* Really unique game play
* 50 challenging levels
* 5 totally cool mini games
* 4 Upcoming game play power-ups
* Supports iOS 6 and GameCenter

Reviews
"Spider Way looks to be a solid puzzler and its pretty damned fun", android-apps.com
"You may find that the game literally challenges your mental and physical abilities." Android-core.com
"Spider Way is worth a download, especially if you like puzzle game." Tuttoandroid.net

Visit our official site at http://www.tangogames.co
Like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/SpiderWay.tg

Support us by your rates and reviews and you'll get updates and new level packs coming soon…
